text: (upbeat music)

- [Speaker] Welcome to IBM
RPA Studio, a full featured,

cloud-based, on-prem, or
software-as-a-service environment,

where you can build automated
process bots that scale,

making your work and your
business faster, safer,
more productive, and cost-effective.
Not a developer, not a problem.

Build, run, test, and
publish low-code bot scripts
that streamline workflows by taking care
of swivel chair interactions
and tackling repetitive manual tasks.
Whatever your skill set,
the IBM RPA Studio gives you the tools
to grow your productivity

without previous programming
language experience.

Unlock the command toolbox
to click and execute hundreds

of built-in database, script,
and wizard based commands.

Plus AI functions, email
connectors, and more,

or drag and drop automation
steps in a graphic,

low-code interface, easily
assemble tailored, repeatable,

and current bots for
the platforms you know,
like SAP, Excel, Outlook, and more.

Debug, solve breakpoints,
evaluate variables,
and attach steps to run time.

Create and apply existing
machine learning models.

Train your bots with AI and
scroll back through a recording
of the steps you've made when it's time

to fine tune something
you've already done.
Ready to create a paperless back office?

Need to deliver smarter self
service agents to customers?
The IBM RPA Studio is
where you can design automation scripts

that get manual tasks,
repetitive functions,

and swivel chair
interactions out of your way.
You can build a better workday, today.
(upbeat music)
